page.title: 17Wrest Park-N.I.A.E.
page.content: Wrest Park has ll0 hectares of various types of land for experimentation, and employs a staff of approx. 4l0. The aim of the Institute is the improvement of agriculture and horticulture. The research and development includes work on tractors, and other self-propelled machines, cultivation, crop establishment and protection,harvesting and storage of grass, arable and greenhouse crops, environment in livestock buildings, greenhouses and crop stores, livestock feeding, milking operations and farm waste treatment. Mechanisation problems of the developing countries are the special concern of the Overseas Division. Staff work in 8 divisions, Agricultural Vehicles,Crop Engineering,Engineering Design & Development,Farm Buildings, Field Machinery,Horticultural Eng.
